algorithm: The new algorithm scores the bins for assignment by multiplying the square root of the item size divided by the rest capacity of the bins, with an additional scaling factor that is equal to the square root of the maximum bin capacity divided by the item size. The scores are then sorted in descending order.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    sqrt_ratio = np.sqrt(item / bins)
    scaling_factor = np.sqrt(max_capacity) / np.sqrt(item)
    
    scores = sqrt_ratio * scaling_factor
    sorted_scores = np.sort(scores)[::-1]
    return scores
